pages.text: Thrinacodus gracia is a species of elongated basal shark related to modern day frilled sharks. Being from the Carboniferous, this makes Thrinacodus one of the earliest known appearances of Frilled Sharks, alongside Phoebodus
$(l)Eats:$() Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
